## Pages
- [Apply as Model - Join Pehenava Fashion Community](/modelapplication): Join Pehenava
- [Join Our Marketplace - Sell on Pehenava](/joinmarketplace): Become a seller on Pehenava. Showcase your ethnic wear designs to a global audience and grow your business with us.
- [Pehenava - Premium Ethnic Wear with VR/AR Trials](/home): Experience the future of ethnic fashion with Pehenava. Try on premium sarees, lehengas, and suits using VR/AR technology. Discover local designers and apply as a model.
- [Personal Stylist - Book a Video Consultation | Pehenava](/personalstylist): Book a personal styling session with our fashion experts. Get personalized advice for weddings, festivals, and more via video call.
- [VR & AR Trials - Virtual Try-On Experience | Pehenava](/vrtrials): Experience the future of fashion with VR and AR trials. Try on ethnic wear virtually using cutting-edge technology at Pehenava.
